verbs.description: [ARG1: at least 1 immigrant] being [V: held] [ARGM-LOC: at otay mesa] has been there 5 years despite ice lacking authorization to incarcerate as punishment at least one person has spent more than five years in immigration and customs enforcement custody at the otay mesa detention center according to data obtained through a records request by the transactional records access clearinghouse of syracuse university punishment otay mesa
